Name: Coconut Curry
Description: Curry simmered with fresh coconut milk and tender reptile meat.

DescriptionLocalization.es: Curry hervido a fuego lento con leche de coco fresca y carne de reptil tierna.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 신선한 코코넛 밀크와 부드러운 파충류 고기를 넣고 끓인 카레.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Viande tendre de reptile mijotée dans du lait de noix de coco et du curry.
DescriptionLocalization.hu: Curry friss kókusztejjel és puha hüllőhússal készítve.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 用新鲜椰汁和鲜嫩的爬行动物肉炖制而成的咖喱
